AbstractHTML: Vole is a GAP package that implements graph backtracking, which can be used to solve many problems in finite permutation groups, such as subgroup intersections, normalisers, set stabilisers, and canonical images of groups.

TitlePage.Abstract: Vole is a GAP package that implements graph backtracking, which can be used to solve many problems in finite permutation groups, such as subgroup intersections, normalisers, set stabilisers, and canonical images of groups.
TitlePage.Acknowledgements: The authors would like to thank the Royal Societyhttps://royalsociety.org (grant codes RGF\EA\181005 and URF\R\180015) for their financial support at the time that &Vole; was created.

ExternalConditions: To compile Vole, Rust needs to be installed and available.

PackageDoc.LongTitle: Vole organises lengthy explorations: Backtrack search in permutation groups with graphs
